appDesc.message: Automatically tracks your episode progress on Kitsu when you stream anime from your browser.

connected.message: You are now connected to Kitsu !

timeNull.message: Episode length is not available in Kitsu database, click "Scrobble now" manually.

scrobbled.message: Episode was added to your animelist

welcomeNotificationMessage.message: Click on me or go in settings to login to your Kitsu account !

welcomePopupMessage.message: Go in settings to login to your Kitsu account !

nothing.message: Nothing is currently detected by Kitsu Web Scrobbler, if you believe that is an error please report the issue on Kitsu feedback.

noresults.message: Anime you are watching cannot be found on Kitsu. You must add it by yourself.

unsure_message.message: Please choose the good one in the list, if it's not here, check on Kitsu.io and submit a DB Request.
